eligibility.title: Eligibility Criteria
eligibility.description: Candidates seeking admission to the diploma programs must fulfill the following educational requirements.
criteria: Candidates must have passed 10th Standard (SSLC) or equivalent examination.
Candidates who have passed 12th Standard (HSC) are eligible for direct admission to the second year (Lateral Entry).
A minimum of 40% marks is required in the qualifying examination.
Science and Mathematics must be major subjects in the qualifying examination.

fees.title: Fee Structure
fees.description: Fees will be collected from the candidates as detailed below for each academic term.

sessions.title: Academic Sessions
sessions.description: Details regarding the examination system and academic calendar.
